articles.content:
Prominent public health expert and advisor to the Odisha government on health, K. Srinath Reddy, warned against pursuing the herd immunity strategy to overcome the COVID-19 pandemic.

articles.title: As pandemic deepens, virus symptoms multiply - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Every week, it seems, the list of coronavirus symptoms—ranging from disagreeable to the deadly—grows longer.
articles.content:
Every week, it seems, the list of coronavirus symptomsranging from disagreeable to the deadlygrows longer.

articles.title: Not good enough: FDA withdraws approval for some China-made masks - Aljazeera.com

articles.title: Sleep difficulties linked to altered brain development in infants who later develop autism - Science Daily
articles.description: New research finds that sleep problems in a baby's first 12 months may not only precede an autism diagnosis, but also may be associated with altered growth trajectory in a key part of the brain, the hippocampus.
articles.content: Infants spend most of their first year of life asleep. Those hours are prime time for brain development, when neural connections form and sensory memories are encoded.But when sleep is disrupted, as occurs more often among children with autism, brain developm… [+7765 chars]

articles.title: Androgens May Explain Male Vulnerability to COVID-19 - Medscape
articles.description: Striking differences in how men and women are affected by COVID-19 might be explained by deleterious effects of androgens in males, say Italian researchers.
articles.content:
Editor's note: Find the latest COVID-19 news and guidance in Medscape's Coronavirus Resource Center.
